MidiHelp.title: MIDI Browser Support
MidiHelp.para1: Some browsers don't provide MIDI support but it can be enabled through third party extensions.
MidiHelp.para2: You can get the extensions and plugin here:
MidiHelp.para3: I've tested Firefox with the plugin and it works, haven't tested it on Safari though.
